coro_ret<int> number_generator(int begin, int count) {    std::cout << "number_generator invoked." << std::endl;    for (int i=begin; i<count; ++i) {        co_yield i;    }    co_return;}
int main(int argc, char* argv[]){    auto g = number_generator(1, 10);    std::cout << "begin to run!" << std::endl;    while(!g.resume()) {        std::cout << "got number:" << g.get() << std::endl;    }
    std::cout << "coroutine done, return value:" << g.get() << std::endl;
    return 0;}

template <typename T>struct coro_ret{  struct promise_type;  using handle_type = std::coroutine_handle<promise_type>;    handle_type coro_handle_;          struct promise_type    {            promise_type() {            std::cout << "promise constructor invoded." << std::endl;        }        ~promise_type() = default;
                auto get_return_object(){            std::cout << "get_return_object invoked." << std::endl;            return coro_ret<T>{handle_type::from_promise(*this)};        }
                                        auto initial_suspend(){                        std::cout << "initial_suspend invoked." << std::endl;            return std::suspend_always{};        }                
        void return_void(){            std::cout << "return void invoked." << std::endl;        }
                auto yield_value(const T& v){            std::cout << "yield_value invoked." << std::endl;            return_data_ = v;            return std::suspend_always{};                    }                auto final_suspend() noexcept{            std::cout << "final_suspend invoked." << std::endl;            return std::suspend_always{};        }                void unhandled_exception(){            std::cout << "unhandled_exception invoked." << std::endl;            std::exit(1);        }                T return_data_;    };
    coro_ret(handle_type h)            : coro_handle_(h)    {    }    ~coro_ret()    {                if (coro_handle_)        {            coro_handle_.destroy();        }    }
        bool resume(){        if (!coro_handle_.done()) {              coro_handle_.resume();        }        return coro_handle_.done();    }
    bool done() const{        return coro_handle_.done();    }
        T get(){        return coro_handle_.promise().return_data_;    }
};

1.1 æ­»é” synchronized ç‰ˆ

public class DeadLockExample {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Object lockA = new Object(); // åˆ›å»ºé” A
        Object lockB = new Object(); // åˆ›å»ºé” B

        // åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹ 1
        Thread t1 = new Thread(new Runnable() {
            @Override
            public void run() {
                // å…ˆè·å–é” A
                synchronized (lockA) {
                    System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 1:è·å–åˆ°é” A!");
                    try {
                        Thread.sleep(1000);
                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                        e.printStackTrace();
                    }
                    // å°è¯•è·å–é” B
                    System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 1:ç­‰å¾…è·å– B...");
                    synchronized (lockB) {
                        System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 1:è·å–åˆ°é” B!");
                    }
                }
            }
        });
        t1.start(); // è¿è¡Œçº¿ç¨‹

        // åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹ 2
        Thread t2 = new Thread(new Runnable() {
            @Override
            public void run() {
                // å…ˆè·å–é” B
                synchronized (lockB) {
                    System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 2:è·å–åˆ°é” B!");

                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {

                    // å°è¯•è·å–é” A
                    System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 2:ç­‰å¾…è·å– A...");
                    synchronized (lockA) {
                        System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 2:è·å–åˆ°é” A!");
                    }
                }
            }
        });
        t2.start(); // è¿è¡Œçº¿ç¨‹
    }
}

import java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock;
import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;

public class DeadLockByReentrantLockExample {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Lock lockA = new ReentrantLock(); // åˆ›å»ºé” A
        Lock lockB = new ReentrantLock(); // åˆ›å»ºé” B

        // åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹ 1
        Thread t1 = new Thread(new Runnable() {
            @Override
            public void run() {
                lockA.lock(); // åŠ é”
                System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 1:è·å–åˆ°é” A!");
                try {
                    Thread.sleep(1000);
                    System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 1:ç­‰å¾…è·å– B...");
                    lockB.lock(); // åŠ é”
                    try {
                        System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 1:è·å–åˆ°é” B!");
                    } finally {
                        lockA.unlock(); // é‡Šæ”¾é”
                    }
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                } finally {
                    lockA.unlock(); // é‡Šæ”¾é”
                }
            }
        });
        t1.start(); // è¿è¡Œçº¿ç¨‹

        // åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹ 2
        Thread t2 = new Thread(new Runnable() {
            @Override
            public void run() {
                lockB.lock(); // åŠ é”
                System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 2:è·å–åˆ°é” B!");
                try {
                    Thread.sleep(1000);
                    System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 2:ç­‰å¾…è·å– A...");
                    lockA.lock(); // åŠ é”
                    try {
                        System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹ 2:è·å–åˆ°é” A!");
                    } finally {
                        lockA.unlock(); // é‡Šæ”¾é”
                    }
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                } finally {
                    lockB.unlock(); // é‡Šæ”¾é”
                }
            }
        });
        t2.start(); // è¿è¡Œçº¿ç¨‹
    }
}
